definitions: residential area on the outskirt of a city
Japanese bedding consisting of a mattress and a duvet
closet (built into the wall of a room)
fermented condiment usu. made from soybeans
to hang up (e.g. a coat, a picture on the wall)
to fall onto (e.g. light or one's gaze)
to be used in a certain place (e.g. money)
to go to and from (a place)
to go back and forth between
to run between (e.g. bus, train, etc.)
to grow cold (from room temperature, e.g. in refrigerator)
head (chief, director) of a section or department
a long time (since the last time)
limited express (train for which a limited-express ticket is required)
to find (e.g. an error in a book)
to commit an error (e.g. in calculation)
local specialty or souvenir bought as a gift while travelling
conclusion from reasoning, judgement or calculation based on something read or heard
calling on someone who is ill
